meanings.definition: A substance that causes the disintegration of cells.
meanings.sent1: The lysins in the detergent help break down stains on clothes.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying how lysins can be used to target specific cancer cells.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kids poured lysins on the sidewalk, pretending it was a potion to dissolve the pavement.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against bacteria, lysins act like tiny wrecking balls, destroying the cell walls.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's power was to emit lysins from his hands, disintegrating any obstacles in his way.
